name: Digital Eclipse Arcade: Invasion of the Buffet Snatchers
name_original: Digital Eclipse Arcade: Invasion of the Buffet Snatchers
description: A series of throwback games made for the Digital Eclipse community, Digital Eclipse Arcade is a celebration of pure arcade gameplay. We periodically post betas of our games for early feedback. Please visit us at www.DigitalEclipse.com for more info.
